title: I have to 𝒘𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒆 things that may be 𝒌𝒖𝒇𝒓 or  haram 𝒊𝒏 𝒂𝒏 𝑬𝒙𝒂𝒎, what to do? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
Who is this? – Assalamu Alaikum - Wa'laykumussalam What can I do for you?
Actually, I wanted to ask a question, as we know  It is not permitted to write 
something Kufr in an exam except if it means we are not able to pass the exam. So actually, in our syllabus, there is something called the meeting of Non-Mahram. There is nothing romantic. This is an exam, whether it is historical, 
novel, facts of history or a fictional thing. As long as it is an exam and they tell you to find 
the answer and give the answer to questions they   are giving even if it contains Non-Mahram 
relationships or something that is Haram, you’re compelled to do it and you are not 
having any conviction or belief in it, rather you’re resenting it, 
there is no problem in that Insha Allah.
